DESCRIPTION: The OpenGL Extension Wrangler Library (GLEW) is a cross-platform open-source C/C++ extension loading library.
PACKAGECONFIG[opengl]: SYSTEM='linux',,virtual/libx11 virtual/libgl libglu libxext libxi libxmu,,,egl-gles2
EXTRA_OEMAKE: ${PACKAGECONFIG_CONFARGS}                 CC='${CC}' LD='${CC}' STRIP=''                 LDFLAGS.EXTRA='${LDFLAGS}'                 POPT='${CFLAGS}'                 GLEW_PREFIX='${prefix}' BINDIR='${bindir}'                 LIBDIR='${libdir}' INCDIR='${includedir}/GL' PKGDIR='${libdir}/pkgconfig'
